title: Genesis team MTA funding request 15/04/21
body:
The mStable genesis team is requesting MTA tokens for the following purposes:

400,000 MTA to be sent to 0x437E8C54Db5C66Bb3D80D2FF156e9bfe31a017db in order to backpay a Genesis team member's token allocation that was sent out today. The team member was contractually entitled to the tokens, so the tokens were taken from the mStable hotwallet to cover the amount needed.

These disbursements are visible in the two transactions below:

- https://etherscan.io/tx/0xeded81dbcd7395a2c712dbfcce7e9f8efbfc2e69bbe1786be1affdd7672ab8d4

- https://etherscan.io/tx/0x4dac2b970a23d0f25efae2c4307945659da6c5b1b4dc09ef74980d055d239562

It is preferable for this approval to be ratified before Monday April 19th, as the hotwallet is now in a shortfall to cover next week's EARN rewards. 

Is this request approved?
author: 0x4B37BbC8CAb32aade27Ce8b1bb2A9E614de81E03
